definition[0]: to make someone laugh or smile
example[0]: He made funny faces to amuse the children.
example[1]: The question seemed to amuse him in some way.
example[2]: It amused me to think back to my life in London.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say they think something is funny rather than say that it amuses them:
definition[1]: to make time pass in an enjoyable way for someone, so that they do not get bored
example[3]: Doing jigsaws would amuse Amy for hours on end.
example[4]: The kids amused themselves playing hide-and-seek.
